name: Data Monetization
short_definition: "KPIs and metrics that provide measurable evidence of the financial benefits derived from data initiatives."
explanation: "KPIs and metrics that provide measurable evidence of the financial benefits derived from data initiatives. These metrics track the revenue generated through data-driven products or services
column5: calculate cost reductions from improved decision-making
column6: and gauge the return on investment (ROI) from data-focused projects."

name: Customer Needs and Satisfaction
short_definition: "KPIs and metrics used to evaluate the alignement of data products with customer needs and expectations."
explanation: "Evaluate the alignment of data products or insights with customer needs and expectations. These indicators include customer retention
column6: and/or satisfaction tied to data-related services. "

name: Market Penetration
short_definition: "KPIs and metrics indicating the extent of target market penetration of data solutions."
explanation: "Indicators that assess the extent to which data solutions have penetrated target markets
column5: measuring factors such as market share growth and the adoption rates of new data products. These KPIs allow companies to gauge the reach and impact of their data monetization strategies within the market
column6: ensuring that these initiatives are effectively attracting and retaining customers."

name: Data Quality
short_definition: "KPIs and metrics indicating the overall quality of datasets."
column7: and other quality-related measures/indicators of data. High-quality data is essential for dependable insights and sound decision-making

column10: impacting the reliability of monetization outcomes. "

name: Data Governance and Compliance
short_definition: "Metrics and KPIs monitoring adherence to data governance principles and regulatory standards."
explanation: "Indicators that monitor adherence to data governance principles and regulatory standards
column5: such as data privacy and security requirements. By aligning data practices with legal and ethical guidelines
column6: these metrics reduce the risks associated with data breaches and regulatory non-compliance
column7: thus fostering trust with clients and stakeholders."

name: Operational Efficiency
short_definition: "KPIs and metrics measuring how well data is integrated within an organization."
explanation: "Metrics that evaluate how effectively data is integrated into the company’s operational processes
column5: assessing the impact of data on productivity and resource management. These indicators help track improvements in process efficiency due to data utilization
column6: ensuring that data-driven operations are streamlined and resources are optimized for maximum productivity. "

name: Technology and Infrastructure
short_definition: "KPIs and metrics assessing an organization's to manage data initiatives."

column5: focusing on aspects such as data storage
column7: and analytics infrastructure. This subcluster ensures that the technical foundation for handling data monetization is in place
column10: and leverage data effectively. Investments in technology and infrastructure support scalability and enhance the organization’s capacity for data-driven innovation."

name: Innovation and Growth
